title: How to Make Rocket Ship Salad

steps.headline: Peel the banana and cut it in half to make two pieces.
Cut the slice of pineapple into quarters to make four pieces.
Assemble rocket ship on a flat dinner plate.
steps.description: The banana half is the body of the rocket, place it pointed end facing upwards. Place two pineapple quarters at the base of the body, facing downwards (the engine thrusters).

steps.headline: For the exhaust that emits on take-off, spoon cottage cheese under the base of the banana in a trail formation - make it fit neatly under the banana, then widen it until it spills out and forms its own wide base.
For the stars, peel a carrot and cut into rounds.
steps.description: Gently cut out four pie slices around the larger carrot rounds to form star shapes. Add these to the "sky" around the banana rocket.

steps.headline: For the moon, add a round cheese.

text: Assemble ingredients.  Peel the banana and cut it in half to make two pieces.  Cut the slice of pineapple into quarters to make four pieces.  Assemble rocket ship on a flat dinner plate. The banana half is the body of the rocket, place it pointed end facing upwards. Place two pineapple quarters at the base of the body, facing downwards (the engine thrusters). For the exhaust that emits on take-off, spoon cottage cheese under the base of the banana in a trail formation - make it fit neatly under the banana, then widen it until it spills out and forms its own wide base.  For the stars, peel a carrot and cut into rounds. Gently cut out four pie slices around the larger carrot rounds to form star shapes. Add these to the "sky" around the banana rocket. For the moon, add a round cheese.
